definition: an approximate definition or example, arrange or order by classes or categories
details:
noun
- an approximate definition or example
= example: an approximate definition or example
- a category of things distinguished by some common characteristic or quality
= synonyms: form
- a person of a particular character or nature
= example: a person of a particular character or nature
- an operation that segregates items into groups according to a specified criterion
= example: an operation that segregates items into groups according to a specified criterion
= synonyms: sorting
verb
- arrange or order by classes or categories
= synonyms: class
- examine in order to test suitability
= synonyms: screen
- to deal with or have fixed something to a satisfactory level
= example: to deal with or have fixed something to a satisfactory level
